sentences.english: Shaoxing county is one of the major grain production areas in Zhengjiang province.
sentences.chinese: 紹興縣是浙江省糧食主要產區之一。

sentences.english: Among hardiest of cherimoya, does well in most present growing areas.
sentences.chinese: 耐寒其中荔枝，做得好，目前大部分主產區。

sentences.english: The company's production from the 22 producing concessions last year totaled over 51, 000 barrels of oil equivalent per day.
sentences.chinese: 公司去年22個產區平均每天產5萬一千桶石油。

sentences.english: Jingbian County is one of the major corn producing areas in North Shaanxi .
sentences.chinese: 靖邊屬陝北玉米主產區之一。

sentences.english: The appellation of Saint-Estèphe is the most northerly of the six village appellations of the Médoc.
sentences.chinese: 聖愛斯泰產區是梅多克地區六個產區中最北部的一個。

sentences.english: The appellation of Saint-Estèphe is the most northerly of the six village appellations of the Médoc.
sentences.chinese: 聖愛斯泰產區是梅多克地區六個產區中最北部的一個。

sentences.english: The area of the property increased from 11 hectares to 29 hectares.
sentences.chinese: 目前該產區的面積從11公頃增加至29公頃的範圍。

sentences.english: Produced only in the village of Saint-Estèphe, the wines of the appellation carry the mark of a territory.
sentences.chinese: 這個產區生產的葡萄酒成爲一個區域的標誌。

sentences.english: The drought has hit eight provinces that produce much of China’s wheat.
sentences.chinese: 乾旱已經打擊了作爲中國小麥主產區的8個省份。

sentences.english: Soybean cyst nematode is one of the most serious diseases in the world soybean areas.
sentences.chinese: 大豆胞囊線蟲病是世界大豆產區危害最重的病害之一。

sentences.english: Moreover it has been awarded with the official seal for organic products from the Murcia region.
sentences.chinese: 此外，產品獲得穆爾西亞產區有機產品的官方標籤。

sentences.english: La Rioja is perhaps one of the most remarkable and reputable denominations of origin in Spain and perhaps the world.
sentences.chinese: 里奧哈是西班牙乃至世界上最知名的葡萄酒產區之一。

sentences.english: Wheat yellow dwarf disease is a major disease in China.
sentences.chinese: 小麥黃矮病是中國小麥產區的重要病害之一。

sentences.english: My house is in the manufacturing district.
The most productive grape variety of all. Airen is a grape variety for producing white wine, planted in almost any wine producing country.
sentences.chinese: 阿依侖用於釀製白葡萄酒，種植於大部分的葡萄產區。

sentences.english: In parts of Saint Emilion the gravel lies on limestone base.
sentences.chinese: 部分聖愛米濃產區砂礫層都平鋪於石灰石土層上。

definition: to produce (by natural growth, or by manufacture, mining etc)/to yield/to turn out/produce/products
source (of a product)/place of origin/manufacturing location
to brew/to make (wine, vinegar, soybean paste etc) by fermentation

local/regional/district (not necessarily formal administrative unit)/region/area/as suffix to city name, means prefecture or county (area administered by a prefecture-level city or county level city)/CL:個|个[ge4]
